FixedPointParameter.Name: gain_patch
FixedPointParameter.Description: Highband Post Gain. Class 1 parameter. Default value: 24756

EnumParameter.Name: ex_s_correction_factor
EnumParameter.Description: De-Esser Flag. Class 1 parameter. Default value: 1

FixedPointParameter.Name: min_s_correction_factor
FixedPointParameter.Description: Minimum Correction Factor1. Class 1 parameter. Default value: 3277

IntegerParameter.Name: high_nrj_thr
IntegerParameter.Description: Gain Threshold done for Level Matching Block. Class 1 parameter. Default value: 60

FixedPointParameter.Name: bw_exp
FixedPointParameter.Description: Bandwidth Expansion Factor for Input LPC Filter. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 31785

IntegerParameter.Name: flatten_order
IntegerParameter.Description: Excitation Flattening LPC Filter Order. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 6

IntegerParameter.Name: start_skip_bin
IntegerParameter.Description: Define Start Frequency Bins for Level Matching of BWX output. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 8

IntegerParameter.Name: end_skip_bin
IntegerParameter.Description: Define End Frequency Bins for Level Matching of BWX output. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 8

FixedPointParameter.Name: echo_fix
FixedPointParameter.Description: Pre-Echo Compensation Factor. Class 2 parameter. Default value: 16384

FixedPointParameter.Name: summand
FixedPointParameter.Description: Modified Mapped Cepstral Vectors with Addition. Class 2 parameter. Default=0

FixedPointParameter.Name: weighting
FixedPointParameter.Description: Modified Mapped Cepstral Vectors with Multiplication. Class 2 parameter. Default=32767
